title: Vienna Kasperl Font
content:
Does anyone recognise this Font? "KASPERLHAUS" and "KASPERL"?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [KASPERL.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011205505/http:/typophile.com/files/KASPERL.jpg) | 27.75 KB |
author: tobepublic

comments.content: Not exact, but it's close especially in all caps. [Neubau](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011205505/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/tipografiaramis/neubau/)
